name: Coding Buggies
description:
Coding Buggies

You're a dev trying to get that program to work...but those bugs just won't stop bugging you! For how much time can you avoid the ¿bUgGiES? without getting too stressed out to continue?

INSTRUCTIONS
  1. Move with arrow keys.
  2. Don't let the bugs hit you!
  3. If you get hit by a bug you'll get stressed.
  4. If you get hit 3 times...game over :(
ISSUES
  • Sometimes, even if you get hit 3 times, game does not end and you can continue playing and keep getting hit by bugs without "dying".
CREDITS

Butterfly by Jordan Irwin (AntumDeluge)  / CC BY 3.0

Some Furniture Assets by Stacy Kendra Love (Narcissist Interactive) / CC BY 3.0

OTHER

Hello! This is Navenne 

This is my first game jam! :)

Also my first game, first time I use Phaser, first time doing pixel art...

Well, you get the idea.

Although it is a simple game, I learned a lot while making this project and I enjoyed it so much! I hope you can have fun playing :)

See you on the next one!
